ygData.subject: Re: Enchanters Research components
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/7/99 10:49:52 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... how ... I can t hep you with your first question... But as for the above... Your trainer
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/7/99 10:49:52 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
duffjc@... writes:

> #2. How do languages work. I have elder erudian, erudin and common, nut
how
> do you get started whith other languages. I talk to the foreegners, but I
> don't get the skill to show up on my skill list? Please help
>

I can't hep you with your first question...

But as for the above...

Your trainer should have some of the other languages now. They appeared at
my trainer after I got research. Train it up a few points (or a lot if you
saved points like I did) and then find a buddy.

Spam your buddy in that language (you can put up to 5 lines of text in a
social) when s/he stops learning ... zone

Then he spams you. You will learn twice. Zone...

You spam him/her. S/he will learn twice. zone...

etc. takes a while. But it works :)

Sonoroud
